description:
Revert r101718 "wait for test script to be loaded"

This change broke all of the page cycler tests on the
chromium.perf waterfall.

TBR=jnd@chromium.org
BUG=53140
TEST=page cyclers work again

Committed: http://src.chromium.org/viewvc/chrome?view=rev&revision=101778

messages.text: What's happening on the bot is that a full page cycler test is run, it gets to the report page, and then the browser window stays on that report page until a timeout is reached.

I'm guessing the internal DEPS needed to be rolled.  I rolled them forward to pick up the test data changes.  I will wait for the bots to get green again before re-landing jnd's change to see if it works.

Johnny, if you get online, the bots are running the page cycler again, and your change hasn't been relanded, feel free to reland it and make sure the tree stays green.

LGTM. Thanks to fix it!

On 2011/09/19 18:29:44, cmp wrote:
> I'm guessing the internal DEPS needed to be rolled.  I rolled them forward to
> pick up the test data changes.  I will wait for the bots to get green again
> before re-landing jnd's change to see if it works.
> 
> Johnny, if you get online, the bots are running the page cycler again, and your
> change hasn't been relanded, feel free to reland it and make sure the tree stays
> green.

subject: Revert r101718 "wait for test script to be loaded"
